concept.code: The client has a history of severe allergic reactions
Hib vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note.
Do not vaccinate client with Hib conjugate vaccine if client has had allergic reaction or known allergies to any component of the vaccine.
